thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Developer Woodbridge seeking bankruptcy court OK for deal with SEC

author: Jim Christie
title: Developer Woodbridge seeking bankruptcy court OK for deal with SEC

organizations.name: sec woodbridge group of companies llc

text:
Woodbridge Group of Companies LLC has asked a Delaware bankruptcy court to sign off on its agreement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission closing a probe that helped push the high-end property developer to file for bankruptcy protection.
Woodbridge sought Chapter 11 protection in December after the SEC in subpoena enforcement actions beginning in September cracked open the companyâ€™s books to look into possible fraudulent sales of securities.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2JoP5em
